translation.en: [Mia] What would you do if, for the last seven months,
translation.fr: Que ferais-tu si, depuis sept mois,

translation.en: your life had been made of walls?
[Mia] Every morsel you eat had been monitored
translation.fr: Si chacune de tes bouchées était contrôlée

translation.en: and every pound of weight you put on, charted.
translation.fr: et chaque kilo pris noté dans ton dossier ?

translation.en: And now, all you have to do to get out
translation.fr: Et maintenant, tout ce que tu dois faire pour sortir,

translation.en: is not be crazy for the next five minutes.
translation.fr: c'est de ne pas sembler dingue pendant cinq minutes.

translation.en: [Mia] Could you do that?
Tick-tock.
[faintly] Mia?
Dr. Nell asked if you were listening.
translation.fr: Le docteur Nell demande si tu écoutes.

translation.en: I am.
I have been, yeah.
Wonderful. Uh, well, we've been through your discharge papers.
translation.fr: Merveilleux. On a passé en revue tes papiers de sortie.

translation.en: That's sorted.
And Dr. Olsen has briefed you on your medication?
translation.fr: Et le docteur Olsen t'a expliqué ton traitement ?

translation.en: -She did. Yes. Very thorough. -[Dr. Nell] That's what we like.
I've sent the prescriptions through to the pharmacy, so Dad, if you want to pick it up,
translation.fr: J'ai transmis l'ordonnance à la pharmacie. Vous pouvez y aller.

translation.en: and Mia, why don't you head up to the dormitory and gather your things?
translation.fr: Mia, tu peux aller au dortoir pour rassembler tes affaires.

translation.en: Meems, you good?
Yeah. Almost done.
[Dr. Nell] Now, in terms of your daily schedule and routine, we've spoken to your school
translation.fr: Concernant ton quotidien, nous avons parlé à ton lycée.

translation.en: and teachers and lunch staff will be on hand to help during the day.
translation.fr: Les professeurs et le personnel seront là pour t'aider pendant la journée.

translation.en: And, at home, as far as the meal plan goes, same routine as here.
translation.fr: Ton programme alimentaire à la maison sera le même qu'ici.

translation.en: And, Mia, a big part of this has to come from you.
translation.fr: Mia, ta guérison dépend surtout de toi.

translation.en: Knowing your own body, respecting the recovery plan.
translation.fr: Tu dois connaître ton corps, respecter ton traitement.

translation.en: We're still in an adjustment period.
[Mia] Get ready to lie…
So you will take it easy to begin with?
[Mia] Now.
Nice.
Good. Then you can shoot off.
[Mia sighs] Home.
[Mia] They say you never remember the smell of home until you've spent some time away.
translation.fr: On ne se souvient de l'odeur de chez soi qu'après en être parti.

translation.en: Well, turns out home is bigger than I thought.
translation.fr: Mon chez-moi, ce n'est pas juste ma maison.

translation.en: This car is home.
London is home.
Home is here.
Home is my dad.
How are you feeling?
Fine.
Back there you had a team of specialists to cater to everything.
translation.fr: Là-bas, tu avais des spécialistes et des infirmières.

translation.en: -Out here you've just got little old me. -And little old Prozac.
translation.fr: - Ici, tu n'as que moi. - Et le Prozac.

translation.en: There is always little old Prozac.
translation.fr: Exact, il y a aussi le Prozac.

translation.en: And teachers, and friends.
translation.fr: Et les profs et les amis.

translation.en: And Mum.
She did really want to be there today.
How's Alex?
Fine. Yeah, fine.
He's really looking forward to having you home.
translation.fr: Il a hâte que tu rentres à la maison.

translation.en: Yeah. Well, for now I just want to lie down in my own bed and be by my lonesome.
translation.fr: Pour l'instant, je veux juste m'allonger sur mon lit et être avec moi-même.

translation.en: Yep, yep, yep. You would want that, wouldn't you?
-Just a few family… -Dad. …and neighbors, and Mrs. McGinty.
translation.fr: C'est juste la famille, les voisins et Mme McGinty.

translation.en: Dad!
Oh, I thought
that you might want to see everyone.
translation.fr: que tu voudrais voir tout le monde.

translation.en: -Oh, Jesus fuck, Rick! -We've all really missed you.
translation.fr: - Bordel, Rick ! - Tu nous as beaucoup manqué.

translation.en: So, I'm being thrown a party for having flown the cuckoo's nest?
translation.fr: On fête mon vol au-dessus du nid de coucou ?

translation.en: -It's fine, fine, fine. -What're you doing?
-I am calling them, telling them to leave. -Wait. No. Fuck. Don't do that.
translation.fr: - Je leur dis de partir. - Mais non.

translation.en: -But you just said-- -It's fine.
-You sure? -Mm-hmm.
[Rick groaning] I'm an idiot!
[Rick] Please try and act surprised.
[all] Surprise! Surprise!
Oh my God, you guys, you shouldn't have!
translation.fr: C'est pas vrai ! Vous n'auriez pas dû.

translation.en: [Mia] Fucking nailed that.
-Aw… -[Mia] Gran.
We couldn't resist, cherub.
-It's lovely to see you too. -Oh, you look so wonderful.
translation.fr: - C'est bon de te revoir. - Tu es superbe.

translation.en: So healthy.
[Mia] Ugh. That word.
Thanks.
Heya.
[Mia] Jesus, hi.
I tried to talk them out of it, believe me.
translation.fr: J'ai essayé de les en dissuader, crois-moi.

translation.en: [woman] Where's my girl?
Oh my God.
Hey, Mum.
Awkward hug incoming.
Darling, sweetheart. I'm so sorry I'm late.
The airport was absolutely horrendous…
[Mia] Or no hug. Yep, that's definitely worse.
translation.fr: Pas de câlin. C'est encore pire.

translation.en: Was everything alright with Dr. Nell?
translation.fr: Ça a été avec le Dr Nell ?

translation.en: [clicks tongue] All fine. Better than fine.
Oh, you are a star.
I'm so sorry I couldn't be more help.
translation.fr: Navrée de ne pas avoir pu faire plus.

translation.en: [Mia] More?
You're here now.
[Gran] Mia?
A slice for the girl of the hour.
translation.fr: Une part pour la star de la fête.

translation.en: [Mia] You've got to be fucking kidding me.
[Gran] I made coconut sponge. Your favorite.
translation.fr: Un gâteau à la noix de coco. Ton préféré.

translation.en: -I'll just be a minute. -Sweetheart, you--
translation.fr: - Je reviens tout de suite. - Ma puce…

translation.en: Overall, could have gone better.
[Mia] Okay, Mia, name five things you can see.
translation.fr: Allez, Mia. Nomme cinq choses que tu vois.

translation.en: Loo roll.
Toilet brush.
Hand cream.
Soap.
Mirror.
Get your shit together, Mia. It's just cake.
translation.fr: Ressaisis-toi, Mia. C'est juste du gâteau.

translation.en: You can't go back there.
translation.fr: Tu ne peux pas y retourner.

translation.en: [Rick] She's not having bloody cake.
translation.fr: Elle ne va pas manger du gâteau.

translation.en: [Gran] But she looks so healthy.
translation.fr: Mais elle a l'air en forme.

translation.en: [Rick] She has an issue with food.
[softly] Healthy.
[Gran] They wouldn't have let her out if she wasn't better.
translation.fr: Si elle n'allait pas mieux, elle y serait encore.

translation.en: -You don't know… -She is okay.
translation.fr: - Tu ne sais pas… - Elle va bien.

translation.en: Um… It does look delicious,
translation.fr: - Tu ne sais pas… - Elle va bien. Ça a l'air délicieux,

translation.en: but I think I might take a rain check. Uh…
The medication. I just feel a bit off.
translation.fr: Les médicaments. Je me sens pas terrible.

translation.en: Of course, darling.
Thank you, Gran.
Why not go and have a lie down?
Relax for a bit.
[Mia] If you drop a glass and it breaks, you can always glue it back together.
translation.fr: Quand tu fais tomber un verre et qu'il se casse, tu peux le recoller.

translation.en: But if you drop it again and again and again,
translation.fr: Mais si tu le fais tomber, encore et encore,

translation.en: eventually, it's going to be more glue than glass.
translation.fr: il finit par y avoir plus de colle que de verre.

translation.en: I wonder which I am now?
I used to write these lists every day.
Everything I ate down to the mouthful.
translation.fr: La moindre bouchée que je mangeais.

translation.en: I thought they were helping me, drowning out the bad thoughts.
translation.fr: Je croyais que ça m'aidait à noyer les pensées négatives.

translation.en: I didn't realize they were drowning out the good as well.
translation.fr: Mais ça noyait aussi les pensées positives.

translation.en: All the everyday beauty I forgot how to see.
translation.fr: La beauté ordinaire que j'ai arrêté de voir.

translation.en: And all the things I get to rediscover now.
translation.fr: Toutes ces choses que je redécouvre maintenant.

translation.en: There she is. How are you feeling, princess?
translation.fr: La voilà. Comment tu te sens, princesse ?

translation.en: Good. Excited.
That's the spirit.
Morning, all.
[Rick] Good morning.
There's some breakfast for you here.
Oh, got to dash. Meeting a new client.
I'm trying to convince them lavender is the new teal.
translation.fr: Je dois les convaincre que lavande, c'est tendance.

translation.en: Smoothie, anyone? [Rick] Remember what Dr. Nell said? Family meals?
translation.fr: - Un smoothie ? - Le Dr Nell a parlé des repas en famille.

translation.en: Yes, but I haven't got time today.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas le temps aujourd'hui.

translation.en: Well, can you make time?
[Mia] Glad to see nothing's changed here.
translation.fr: Contente de voir que rien n'a changé.

translation.en: [Viv] Sorry, did you say something?
translation.fr: - Tu disais ? - Tu pourrais déjeuner avec nous.

translation.en: [Rick] Might be nice for you to eat with us.
translation.fr: - Tu disais ? - Tu pourrais déjeuner avec nous. On n'aura rien à manger si je ne travaille pas.

translation.en: [Viv] Food doesn't get on the table if I don't work, I'm afraid.
translation.fr: On n'aura rien à manger si je ne travaille pas.

translation.en: Now, before you go…
[Mia] Oh great, "a little chat."
We thought it might be best to have a little chat with you.
translation.fr: On aimerait avoir une petite conversation avec toi.

translation.en: Darling, chat?
Mia. You know how much today is worth?
translation.fr: Mia, tu sais que c'est une journée importante.

translation.en: Flying solo for the first time in six months…
translation.fr: Tu vas naviguer solo pour la première fois en six mois…

translation.en: Seven months.
We're giving you this chance to show us that you're ready.
translation.fr: On te donne l'occasion de nous montrer que tu es prête.

translation.en: We just want you to stay here and be happy with us.
translation.fr: On veut que tu sois heureuse, ici avec nous.

translation.en: And we want you to be honest this time.
translation.fr: On veut que tu sois sincère, cette fois.

translation.en: I know.
So, just for emergencies…
Oh, where's my phone?
Yeah, the advice says no social media.
translation.fr: On nous a dit : "Pas de réseaux sociaux."

translation.en: Might as well have given me a cup and string.
translation.fr: Aussi bien qu'une boîte de conserve et du fil.

translation.en: Right, now that's over with, to the office with me.
translation.fr: Bon, ça, c'est fait. Je pars au bureau.

translation.en: Cinnamon.
Thanks for holding the fort.
Bloody mental baskets, aren't they?
You're a bit Disney this morning.
translation.fr: Tu es fleur bleue, ce matin.

translation.en: Oh, look at me, just walking in the sun.
No one to tell me where to go, what to do.
translation.fr: Personne ne me dit où aller, quoi faire.

translation.en: This is living, my brother.
This is…
[Mia] Oh shit.
I'll be nearby, okay?
My first friend.
Best friend.
Or so I thought.
-Hey, skinny. -[Mia scoffs]
What?
No. I read somewhere that you're supposed to acknowledge it. No repression and that.
translation.fr: J'ai lu quelque part qu'il fallait en parler. Pas de censure.

translation.en: You're looking taller.
Yeah, well, it's been a while.
translation.fr: Ça fait un bout de temps.

translation.en: No kidding.
I missed you, M.
Right.
-I'm sorry. -Since when did you start smoking?
translation.fr: - Je suis désolé. - Depuis quand tu fumes ?

translation.en: Is that a veiled hint?
I like my lungs, they've always been on my side.
translation.fr: J'aime mes poumons, ils m'ont toujours soutenue.

translation.en: Look, M, can we…
Can we talk about it?
About what happened.
[girl] Oh, would you look at this vision!
[Mia] Becca, quite possibly a Mensan.
And Will, my wife.
Doth mine eyes deceive me!
Called in the cavalry.
Any longer and I might have just weed myself.
translation.fr: Un jour de plus et je faisais pipi au lit.

translation.en: -You literally visited me three days ago. -Oh, three miserable days.
translation.fr: - On s'est vus il y a trois jours. - Trois jours interminables.

translation.en: [Mia] These are the greatest people of all time.
translation.fr: Ce sont les meilleures personnes au monde.

translation.en: -Too long. -Way too long.
Never again?
No promises. Never promises.
translation.fr: Pas de promesses. Jamais de promesses.

translation.en: Never again.
I'm all yours now.
Let's go fuck up some shit. [laughs]
Mia, are you okay?
Yeah, yeah, I'm fine.
Uh, excuse me!
Hey, there you are. I thought you'd gone overboard.
translation.fr: Te voilà. Je croyais que tu t'étais noyée.

translation.en: -You're good, yeah? -Oh, fuck good.
translation.fr: - Ça va, t'es sûre ? - Mais non.

translation.en: She's better than good, she's free.
translation.fr: Mieux que ça. Elle est libre.

translation.en: So much to see, so much to do. I mean, where do we even start?
translation.fr: Tant à voir, tant à faire. Par où on commence ?

translation.en: I was thinking maybe the cinema? Or the skate park?
translation.fr: Pourquoi pas le ciné ? Ou le skatepark ?

translation.en: Oh… [laughs] We haven't gone there in forever.
translation.fr: On n'y est pas allés depuis un bail.

translation.en: Uh, the cinema though, we can go this Friday?
translation.fr: On peut aller au ciné vendredi ?

translation.en: -Becs, this Friday we're supposed to be-- -[Will] Oh shit.
translation.fr: - Becs, ce vendredi, il y a… - Merde !

translation.en: Is that…
Oh God, hide me.
-I told her that I moved to Cameroon. -Why? Who is she?
translation.fr: - J'étais censé déménager au Cameroun. - C'est qui ?

translation.en: The one that wanted to role-play as Mary, Queen of Scots
translation.fr: Celle qui kiffe les jeux de rôles

translation.en: or the one who wanted to stick a finger up--
Yes. Her.
So you had… sex with her?
translation.fr: Ça veut dire que tu as couché avec elle ?

translation.en: Who hasn't he had sex with? That's the real question.
translation.fr: Avec elle et toutes les autres.

translation.en: You can talk. At least I'm not going at it with my boss.
translation.fr: Tu peux parler. Je me tape pas mon boss, moi.

translation.en: Seriously, you guys!
What? You said no salacious gossip till she was back.
translation.fr: Quoi ? "Pas de ragots salaces jusqu'à son retour."

translation.en: She's back!
Only just. She's still in recovery.
Ah! She is recovered. Look at her.
And the only thing she's starved of right now is gossip.
translation.fr: Prête à faire une boulimie de ragots.

translation.en: And I will be your waiter this evening.
translation.fr: Je suis votre serveur, ce soir.

translation.en: And excuse me, me and my boss are not just "at it."
translation.fr: Et pardon, mais je me "tape" pas mon boss.

translation.en: It was magical. In the store cupboard at work.
translation.fr: C'était magique. Dans la réserve au taf.

translation.en: He kept giving me eyes over the cheese counter.
translation.fr: Il me matait par-dessus le comptoir à fromage.

translation.en: I still get a tingle when I think about Manchego.
translation.fr: J'ai des frissons en pensant au Manchego.

translation.en: Well, I'm glad I still have one respectable friend.
translation.fr: Je suis ravie d'avoir encore une amie respectable.

translation.en: Here's to our interminable virginity.
Ha-ha! She's a woman now!
What? No! You too?
-With who? -Just this guy at Reading.
translation.fr: - Avec qui ? - Un type à Reading.

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me?
Wasn't worth mentioning. It was no big deal.
No big deal?
I'm pretty sure you compared it to… [panting] …a religious experience.
translation.fr: Tu as comparé ça à… une expérience religieuse.

translation.en: Oh, speaking of drunken mistakes, did you hear what Steph got up to at Nick's after we left?
translation.fr: En parlant d'erreurs d'ivrogne, vous savez ce qu'a fait Steph chez Nick ?

translation.en: [Mia] Fuck, how can I have missed so much in seven months?
translation.fr: Bordel. Comment j'ai pu rater autant de trucs en sept mois ?

translation.en: -Hey. Bro. -All right?
It's like bloody Sesame Street in here.
Right?
Steph! Leanne! Sarah, you gorgeous thing!
translation.fr: Steph ! Leanne ! Sarah, tu es magnifique !

translation.en: You'll get used to it.
Yo, Becs, what you sayin'?
You're mates with Jonah? But we hate Jonah.
translation.fr: Tu es pote avec Jonah ? On déteste Jonah.

translation.en: He has the good weed.
translation.fr: Il a de la bonne beuh.

translation.en: There are multiple weeds?
translation.fr: Y en a de la mauvaise ?

translation.en: I am sorry…
that I didn't tell you about Reading. I thought with everything--
translation.fr: de ne pas t'avoir parlé de Reading. J'ai pensé…

translation.en: It's fine.
I get it. You were protecting me.
translation.fr: Je comprends. Tu as voulu me protéger.

translation.en: The concept of virginity is some bullshit invention of the patriarchy anyway.
translation.fr: La virginité est un concept pourri inventé par le patriarcat.

translation.en: Come on. We're this way.
Oi. Out my chair.
Oh, of course, sorry.
Uh, move along, dickhead.
Hello!
Hello!
Welcome, everyone, on this very special morning.
translation.fr: Bienvenue à tous en cette matinée très spéciale.

translation.en: [Mia] Christ. Not you too, Miss Lambert.
translation.fr: Pitié. Pas vous aussi, Mme Lambert.

translation.en: As discussed in the last registration,
translation.fr: Comme nous en avons parlé la dernière fois,

translation.en: the lovely Mia Polanco is rejoining us.
translation.fr: c'est le grand retour de notre chère Mia Polanco.

translation.en: So everyone, please be extra, especially welcoming.
translation.fr: Alors, s'il vous plaît, soyez tous très chaleureux.

translation.en: -Just like we talked about. -[Mia] Perfect.
translation.fr: - Comme nous en avons parlé. - Parfait.

translation.en: That's perfect.
In AA, one of the first things they tell you
translation.fr: Aux alcooliques anonymes, la règle numéro un,

translation.en: is to avoid people, places, and things that trigger you.
translation.fr: c'est d'éviter les gens, les endroits et tout ce qui peut être un déclencheur.

translation.en: This doesn't exactly help when your trigger is something
translation.fr: Ça ne fonctionne pas quand ton déclencheur,

translation.en: you literally need in order to literally live.
And it isn't just eating that's the problem. It's after.
translation.fr: Le problème n'est pas seulement de manger. C'est après.

translation.en: It's the aching, inside-out panic of feeling the food settle.
translation.fr: C'est la panique douloureuse de sentir la nourriture descendre.

translation.en: Every day.
Trying always to find a better reason than "because they tell me to."
translation.fr: Il faut trouver une meilleure raison que : "Parce qu'on me dit de le faire."

translation.en: Hi.
My name is Mia Polanco.
One moment.
There you go.
[Mia] Of course they saddle me with the Dwayne Johnson of potatoes.
translation.fr: Évidemment, ils m'ont donné une énorme pomme de terre.

translation.en: Nope, it's fine.
Just a simple enormous potato.
[Becca] So what are we going to serve?
-Tequila? -[Will] Going to be absolutely rattled.
translation.fr: - De la tequila ? - On sera bourrés.

translation.en: -Absolutely. -[Will shushing]
What are you guys talking about?
[Will] I was just saying that Yorkie is the ultimate gay chocolate bar.
translation.fr: Je disais que Yorkie est la barre de chocolat gay ultime.

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Bollocks. What about Twix or Mounds Bar?
translation.fr: N'imp ! Et Twix ou Mounds Bar ?

translation.en: Twix is pan, Mounds Bars are lesbian. Keep up.
translation.fr: Twix, c'est pan, Mounds Bars, lesbienne.

translation.en: And what are Skittles?
-Ooh, Skittles. -Orgy.
Mia. I didn't know you'd be back today.
translation.fr: Mia. J'ignorais que tu revenais aujourd'hui.

translation.en: [Mia] Alison. Entirely her own adjective.
Yeah, I figured it was time to--
Great. Great.
Hey, guys.
-Hi, Cameron. -Hi.
So, wow. [scoffs] It's been forever.
When's the last time I saw you? Like, Year 10?
translation.fr: Je t'ai vue quand, en troisième ?

translation.en: I was here last year. It's been like seven months.
translation.fr: J'étais là l'an dernier. Ça fait sept mois.

translation.en: Yeah. Ages.
So, how are you? How was it?
translation.fr: Alors, comment ça va ? C'était comment ?

translation.en: It was… It was fine. You know how it is.
translation.fr: Ça a été. Tu sais ce que c'est.

translation.en: Well, no. I don't. I've never been to a mental hospital.
translation.fr: Non, aucune idée. J'ai jamais été à l'HP.

translation.en: So, uh, A-levels are kicking my arse.
translation.fr: J'ai jamais été à l'HP. Je galère avec les révisions du bac. Et toi, Alison ?

translation.en: -Alison, how are you finding them? -[Alison sighs]
translation.fr: Je galère avec les révisions du bac. Et toi, Alison ?

translation.en: I totally bombed the first assessment in Bio
translation.fr: J'ai foiré la première éval de bio

translation.en: and I've never heard of any of the set texts for English.
translation.fr: et je connais aucun des ouvrages en littérature.

translation.en: -One of them is Hamlet. -I know, right? It's crazy.
translation.fr: - Il y a Hamlet. - Je sais. C'est dingue !

translation.en: So, was your room all padded and stuff?
-Uh, no, that's not really-- -Don't get me wrong.
I totally get where you're coming from.
One summer, I literally lived off of nothing but Polo Mints.
translation.fr: Un été, je me suis nourrie uniquement de bonbons à la menthe.

translation.en: -Oh, I'm so sorry, that sounds-- -No, don't be.
translation.fr: - Désolée, ça a dû être… - Non. Tu rigoles ?

translation.en: I looked great. I wore crop tops for like two months.
translation.fr: J'étais superbe. J'ai porté des crop tops pendant deux mois.

translation.en: Are you going to Theo's party on Friday?
translation.fr: Tu vas à la fête de Theo vendredi ?

translation.en: -Why are you all being weird? -He probably didn't know to invite you.
translation.fr: - Vous êtes bizarres. - Il savait pas s'il devait t'inviter.

translation.en: -It probably won't be that good anyway. -Oh.
At his last party, Will was literally like,
translation.fr: À sa dernière fête, Will était genre :

translation.en: "I've peaked. Kill me now. Life will not get better than this."
translation.fr: "Je trippe. Tuez-moi. La vie sera plus jamais aussi bien."

translation.en: [Mia] I thought I needed to get back to the person I was before,
translation.fr: Je pensais pouvoir retrouver celle que j'étais avant,

translation.en: to the things I loved,
but they all kept moving while I stood still.
translation.fr: mais tout a changé alors que j'ai fait du sur place.

translation.en: Parties, drinking, drugs, sex. That's the new normal.
translation.fr: Les fêtes, l'alcool, la drogue, le sexe. C'est la nouvelle normalité.

translation.en: That's what I need to catch up on, or else I'll be left behind.
translation.fr: Je dois rattraper mon retard, sinon je vais être larguée.

translation.en: I'm way more in the mood for the cinema anyway.
translation.fr: Je préfère grave aller au ciné.

translation.en: -Oh yeah. -Mm. Me too.
Or we could stay in, do Clueless again.
translation.fr: Sinon, on peut mater Clueless à la maison.

translation.en: Like, if… if you guys want. I don't really care.
translation.fr: Comme vous voulez. Je m'en fiche.

translation.en: [Mia] A party is the perfect place to catch up.
translation.fr: Une fête est l'endroit idéal pour rattraper son retard.

translation.en: All the birds, one stone.
Where are you going?
The other side.
This is a good idea. This is a good idea.
-This is a good-- -Theo! Oh God. I'm so sorry.
translation.fr: - Une très bonne… - Theo ! Mince. Je suis navrée.

translation.en: -[Theo] That's okay. -[Mia] Sorry.
-No, that's okay. It's, um… -Hi.
[Mia] Theo. The cutest of the cute.
translation.fr: Theo. Le plus mignon de tous.

translation.en: Mia! You're back. Oh, that's bloody ace.

translation.en: Can I come on Friday?
What?
To the party.
Is it, like, cool if I come?

translation.en: Oh right.
Yeah, sure. If… you want to.
translation.fr: Bien sûr que non. Si tu en as envie.

translation.en: Really?
I mean, great, perfect. Um…
Is there like an invitation I need to get in, or…
translation.fr: Est-ce que j'ai besoin d'une invitation ou…

translation.en: Uh, no, that's not really a thing.
translation.fr: Non, ça ne se fait pas.

translation.en: Right. Of course.
So does that mean there won't be any party bags?

translation.en: Damn, I knew there was something I forgot.

-Is that why you want the invite? -Only reason. For the Chupa Chups.

translation.en: Guess I got some serious shopping to do.

Yeah, you will.
What the hell was that?
Just told Theo that I'd stop by the party if he was cool with it.

translation.en: And he was.
Okay, I'm loving this energy.
Are you sure this is a good idea? You just came out of the hospital.

translation.en: Becs, I love you, but you really need to stop fussing.

sex…

translation.en: Loads of slobbery boys called Henry.

How do you kiss?

Why do you need to know?

See, now, imagine there's a third nose between your noses.

That's when you close your eyes. When you're nose-width apart.

translation.en: -Nose-width? -Mm-hmm.

I had it earlier.

translation.en: Thank you.

How am I 16 and can't just do that?

That is so fun. Get proper wavy gravy.

She's gone. She's gone!
